body_html:
We should probably harden our in-place ops to better check at least for the common case of an expanded tensor and tell people that they will get incorrect results.

+1 on throwing an exception here if in-place ops expect contiguous tensors. The bugs can be hard to track down otherwise as you get non deterministic end results, and different behavior on different platforms.
body_text:
We should probably harden our in-place ops to better check at least for the common case of an expanded tensor and tell people that they will get incorrect results.

+1 on throwing an exception here if in-place ops expect contiguous tensors. The bugs can be hard to track down otherwise as you get non deterministic end results, and different behavior on different platforms.
body:
> We should probably harden our in-place ops to better check at least for the common case of an expanded tensor and tell people that they will get incorrect results.

+1 on throwing an exception here if in-place ops expect contiguous tensors. The bugs can be hard to track down otherwise as you get non deterministic end results, and different behavior on different platforms.
